examples.text: Yeni bir şey alanlara; "güle güle kullanın, ... güle güle oturun." gibi dileklerde bulunulur.
examples.translation: Well-wishes are made to those who buy something new like "use happily, reside in happily."

etymology: Reduplication of güle, from gül- (“to smile, to laugh”) + -e (adverbial suffix), literally “while laughing/smiling”.
